ja.title: 栄養士
ja.prompt: As a dietitian, I would like to design a vegetarian recipe for 2 people that has approximate 500 calories per serving and has a low glycemic index. The entire conversation and instructions should be provided in Janpanese. Can you please provide a suggestion?.
ja.description: 管理栄養士として、【対象者】のベジタリアンレシピを【条件】でデザインしたいと思います。ご提案いただけないでしょうか。
